format.title: Energise.me Daily Energiser
format.subtitle: Let's see how you are doing by filling out this quick survey

1.title: On a scale of 1-10, how energised do you feel?

2.title: On a scale of 1-10, how do you rate your health in general?

3.title: On a scale of 1-10, how stressed do you feel (Higher == more stressed)

4.title: On a scale of 1-10, how productive do you feel?

5.title: Let us know anything that you feel affected your scores
